title: Choose ICQ over Telegram 今日最大笑話

replies.msg:
Pavel, former founder of VK started Telegram to fight with censorship and protect user’s privacy — VK was forced to sold to Mail.ru & DST by Russian Gov.

ICQ was later acquired by Mail.ru & DST, where Tencent is a big shareholder in DST. ICQ is now the absolute opposite of what Telegram is aiming for.

Seriously you guys choose ICQ over Telegram???
